Name: Oftalmogarden
About the game: Oftalmogarden is a fast and chaotic roguelike shooter set on a bizarre eyeball-populated planet where you get both upgrades and curses. You are not welcome here, the sky is watching and time is running out. You receive curses by staying in gardens, so be quick to find the exit. Find good weapons and hunt down eyeball monsters to complete gardens and gain XP for upgrades. Things will get harder and harder as you go further and accumulate curses, how long can you survive?
Meta Title: Oftalmogarden: Dec 28, 2021, Nazorus and Full Overview
